name: Godot 4 beta - 3D Space Platformer
description:
Notice: In the web player, Press Tab to capture the cursor and move the camera

Based on a "Super Galactic" plumber game for a motion based console, I tried to replicate a basic controller with RigidBody3D physics to take advantage of Area3D gravity modifiers. 

You can jump from planet to planet, but you might go flying into space, for an eternity, press R to restart.

Controls:

ASDW: Move

Space: Jump

Mouse: Move camera

Esc/Tab: Capture or free cursor
